answers.answer: Hello.There are a few possibilities. You could have a thyroid dysfunction. There could be peripheral neuropathy (less likely, though). You may have high blood pressure or diabetes.Menopause is usually one of the causes, but, your age rule out that.Have you been to any doctor for this ?Regards

question: I would like to know what it mean when my body feels like it is burning all over?
title: i feel like im burning
